projects.title: Whole Home AC Replacement
projects.description: Complete replacement of a 20-year-old system with a high-efficiency Trane unit. Homeowner saw 35% energy savings in the first month.

projects.title: Emergency AC Repair
projects.description: Compressor failure during peak summer heat. Diagnosed and repaired same day, restoring cooling to a family of five.

projects.title: Commercial HVAC Install
projects.description: Multi-zone commercial HVAC installation for a 4,000 sq ft office space. Custom ductwork design for optimal airflow.

projects.title: Ductwork Renovation
projects.description: Complete duct sealing and insulation upgrade in a 1990s home. Eliminated hot spots and improved airflow throughout.

projects.title: Smart Thermostat Upgrade
projects.description: Ecobee smart thermostat installation with whole-home sensor setup. Integrated with existing HVAC for optimal scheduling.

projects.title: Heat Pump Conversion
projects.description: Converted traditional gas furnace to high-efficiency heat pump system. Better for the environment and lower operating costs.
